name: WordsandLetters
0:
”Alexa, start letter test”
”Alexa, let's play letter test”
”Alexa, open letter test”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: letter test
des: Alexa will choose a letter and you have to think of as many words as you can that start with that letter. Alexa will keep track, see how many you can think of!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
